item.description:
HOST: Claire P 

cell # 603-247-0897

 

How about an afternoon of ice skating?  I will be going to JFK Coliseum Ice Skating Arena and hope that some of you will join me!  It’s always so much more fun when we do things as a group. 

The public skating takes place at 2:00 and last two hours.  Feel free to join us anytime between 2:00 and 4:00.  After the event, we will decide on a nearby venue for a hot drink, snack or light meal  and great conversation with  good company. 

Please remember to wear layers and gloves, so that you will stay comfortable and warm.  I hope to see you there!

 

 

If you will be renting skates, I recommend that you bring extra socks, to be sure that your feet are "cushioned" comfortably into the skates. 

 

Directions:   from rte 93N, merge onto I-293 N/RT-101 W via the exit on the LEFT toward MANCHESTER AIRPORT/BEDFORD/MANCHESTER, take the RT-28 N/SO. WILLOW ST-NORTH exit, EXIT 1, toward DOWNTOWN, turn RIGHT onto S WILLOW ST/RT-28 N, turn RIGHT onto RT-28 N/S MAPLE ST, LEFT onto AUBURN ST,  take the 1st LEFT onto BEECH ST/RT-28 S, 303 BEECH ST is on the LEFT.

 

Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All  meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: Ice Sakting at JFK Arena in Manchester
